home.title: Hello! Nice to see you here!
home.descriptionProfile: "Truth can only be found in one place: the code.â€œ
home.aboutMe: With a diverse trajectory, my professional journey began in the world of music, where I dedicated more than a decade to improving my talents as a multi-instrumentalist. I had the opportunity to play in different places and meet incredible people. In parallel with my career as a musician, I earned my degree in Business Administration and explored several professional opportunities, including a period as an entrepreneur.
home.aboutMe2: Today, I hold a postgraduate degree in Engineering and DevOps Planning, and I am fully immersed in the world of programming. I channel all my passion and creativity into creating real solutions for my clients, covering technologies that span from the Front-end to the Back-end, leveraging all the know-how I have accumulated throughout my life.
home.aboutMe3: I am an avid reader of topics such as Software Architecture, Clean Code, Design Patterns, Cybersecurity, TDD, and other techniques that enrich my journey as a programmer every day. My commitment is to continually learn and grow in this exciting field alongside my professional colleagues!

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Are you interested in my work? Feel free to get in touch! I would love to have the opportunity to communicate with you more effectively.

select.firstOption: I would like to ask a question
select.secondOption: I would like to make a proposal
select.thirdOption: I would like to start a project
